Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER across all process variants that include this activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in successful payment paths (i.e., variants ending with Payment Handled)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER compared to the total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Time from Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Cycle time of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that include rework (e.g., rejected declarations followed by resubmission)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Average time it takes Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to be done in cases that go through pre-approval versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants involving multiple rejections prior to approval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Minimum time between Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and Request Payment in successful end-to-end variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to Payment Handled compared to variants that skip the BUDGET OWNER step
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Time of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER relative to the overall process duration in variants where it appears
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER after the execution of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, specifically in university-wide 2018 data versus 2017 departmental data
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'", 'end': "activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
